dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A physics-based environment for the NeurIPS 2019 Learning to Move - Walk Around challenge, where participants develop a controller for a musculoskeletal model to walk or run following velocity commands with minimum effort.
dcterms:title: NeurIPS 2019 Learning to Move - Walk Around challenge

John Quan
Remi Munos
Will Dabney
dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning algorithm that utilizes recurrent experience replay to improve data efficiency and learning stability in distributed reinforcement learning settings.
dcterms:title: R2D2

dcterms:creator: Marcin Andrychowicz
Filip Wolski
Alex Ray
Jonas Schneider
Rachel Fong
Peter Welinder
Bob McGrew
Josh Tobin
Pieter Abbeel
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: An algorithm that allows agents to learn from past experiences by replaying them in a way that focuses on the most informative experiences, improving learning efficiency.
dcterms:title: Hindsight Experience Replay
